column4: I need help hot syncing my palm tero to my computer can anyone help?
what does lsb_release -a say in the terminal for you
is this version 7.10 (gutsy gibbon) of ubuntu?
and the name of the device is the palm Tero? that is the exact name? no numbers or anything else?
okay let me check something, hang on a sec
is that the tero or the Treo?
no worries just want to be sure ;]
could you look here and see if that is for your palm--> http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=2893546&postcount=5

sudo apt-get install jpilot then sudo modprobe visor and add visor to the list in /etc/modules , then to sync open jpilot and enter usb in the preferences settings step #4 you can read and do yourself I think ;]
i dont under stand the add visor to the list in /etc/modules
